name: mattman
cooked: Yes. That’s the kind of stuff OSHWA should be doing. We need some killer apps that really show off what open source hardware is capable of and get a lot of attention. We’ll be more likely to achieve that if we find partnerships with large and/or popular entities.
raw: Yes. That's the kind of stuff OSHWA should be doing. We need some killer apps that really show off what open source hardware is capable of and get a lot of attention. We'll be more likely to achieve that if we find partnerships with large and/or popular entities.
